name: 'BELLA' HERITAGE BABY
description: SPECIALLY FORMULATED FOR LITTLE PEOPLE- BLENDING LIGHT AND DELICATE APRICOT KERNEL OIL, CASTOR OIL FOR SOFT SILKINESS AND LATHER WITH OUR 'BELLA' HERITAGE BAR OF RARE BREED ANGLO NUBIAN MILK, SAPONIFIED OLIVE OIL AND RARE BREED OIL SEED

name: 'BELLA' HERITAGE CREAM
description:
NATURAL RICH PRODUCT THAT IS GENTLE ON THE SKIN, FULL OF PROTEIN AND MINERALS, A GREAT CREAM FOR THE MOST SENSITIVE SKIN TYPES. THE BUTTERY ANGLO-NUBIAN MILK DRAWS THE ADDED BUTTERS AND OILS INTO THE SKIN
PRODUCED USING MINIMAL INGREDIENTS, THIS CREAM IS BEST USED SPARINGLY AS A LITTLE GOES A LONG WAY, AND YOUR SKIN WILL FEEL AMAZING.

name: 'BELLA' HERITAGE BAR
description: MILK SOURCED EXCLUSIVLEY FROM AUSTRALIAN PURE-BRED HERITAGE ANGLO-NUBIANS AS RECOGNISED BY THE RARE-BREEDS TRUST OF AUSTRALIA, INFUSED WITH LIGHT & DELICATE OLIVE OIL & RARE-BREED OIL SEED, DIVINE IN A CLASS ALL OF ITS OWN!!

name: AUSTRALIAN EARTH CLAYS 100G MIN
description:
THE ONLY COLOUR ADDED TO OUR SOAPS IS NATURAL AUSTRALIAN EARTH CLAYS- AND IN JUST A SMALL AMOUNT OF OUR BARS, THEY GIVE THE IMPRESSION OF MARBLE WHEN USING. THEY ARE TOXIN FREE, AND NATURAL.
RED:REPLENISHES/REGENERATES & SOFTENS.
GREEN:DETOXIFICATION OF THE SKIN CELLS.
PINK:IMPROVES TEXTURE.
YELLOW:EXFOLIATES/TONES
 **PLEASE NOTE THERE MAY BE SOME RUN-OFF OF THE COLOUR IN WATER**

name: BATH TIME
description:
'BELLA BATH'- SHAVINGS OF SENSITIVE SKIN SOAP
'LEXI BATH'-SHAVINGS OF LAVENDER SOAP/BATH SALTS
'ROXY BATH'-SHAVINGS OF ROSE GERANIUM SOAP/BATH SALTS

**other varieties available on request**

name: **NEW LINES**ALL 100G MIN
description:
"BLACK VELVET"
BLACK CHERRY SORBET AROMA LIGHT AND SPRIGHTLY, BEAUTIFULLY ENHANCED WITH AUSTRALIAN EARTH CLAY

name: FRAGRANT AROMAS 100G MIN
description:
'BAYLEE'- FRAGRANT FRANGIPANI, FRESH SWEET AROMA.
'COCO'- COCONUT FRAGRANCE, RICH SWEET TROPICAL COCONUT.
'JESSY'- FRAGRANT JASMINE, WARM RICH FLORAL AROMA.
'SHAI'-HONEYSUCKLE FRAGRANCE,SWEET SMELLING FLORAL
'SAMOSI'-FRAGRANT SANDALWOOD, WOODED FRAGRANCE
'SARI'-DEWBERRY FRAGRANCE- DELICATE SWEET AROMA.

name: FAVOURITE ESSENTIAL OILS 100G MIN
description:
'LEXI'- LOCALLY GROWN ESSENTIAL LAVENDER OIL, ANTI-FUNGAL, AIDS WOUND HEALING, BEAUTIFUL DEEP SMELL.
'TAMMY'- ESSENTIAL TEA TREE OIL, ANTI-ITCH, ALSO DANDRUFF ANDANTI-FUNGAL.
'ROXY'- ROSE GERANIUM, MAY CLEAR SLUGGISH OILY SKIN, THIS OIL HAS A RICH FRAGRANCE OF ROSE.
'MARNI'-LEMON MYRTLE, GREAT FOR OILY,ACNE PRONE SKIN, DEEP CITRUS AROMA.
'DEMI'- PATCHOULI, SOOTHES THE IRRITATION OF DRY SKIN, ANIT-BACTERIAL, ANTI-FUNGAL.
'INDI'- LEMONGRASS COCHIN, LOVELY EARTHY AROMA, GREAT SKIN TONER.
'BENJI'- BERGAMOT CALABRIAN OIL, DEODORIZES, SKIN CONDITIONER, FOR OILY SKIN TYPES.
'PEPPI'- PEPPERMINT OIL, RICH AROMATIC PEPPERMINT, ANTI-ITCH, NOURISH DEAD/OILY SKIN.
'CASSI'- CINNAMON LEAF EXTRACT AND SPICE, WARM SPICY AROMA, MAY EASE JOINT PAIN.

name: ESSENTIAL OILS- CITRUS FRESH 100G MIN
description:
'KARLI'- ESSENTIAL SWEET AUSTRALIAN ORANGE, ANTI-SEPTIC/ANTI-INFLAMMATORY.
'GEMMA'-ESSENTIAL LIME OIL, FRESH CITRUS AROMA, SUITED TO OILY, ACNE PRONE SKIN.
'LEVI' ESSENTIAL LEMON OIL, INVIGORATING ANTI-BACTERIAL, ANTI-SEPTIC PROPERTIES MAY HELP ACNE, OILY SKIN TYPES.

name: EXFLOLIENTS/HARD WORKING HANDS-GARDENERS 100G MIN
description:
'CHARLEE'- HONEY & OATMEAL, LOCAL FRESH HONEY AND SOFT OATMEAL.
'MIKA'- GROUND FLUFFY ALMOND MEAL AND FRAGRANT MUSK OIL, SMELLS DIVINE.
'BEAU'-PUMICE STONE GRANULES & EUCALYPTUS OIL, THIS BAR GETS GREASE/DIRT OUT OF THE SKIN, WITHOUT DRYING IT OUT.

name: BUTTERS 100G MIN
description:
'MADDI'- COCOA BUTTER,  RICH IN PROTEIN/VIT E IMPORVES SKIN ELASTICITY, REDUCES DRYNESS.
'MOET'- MANGO BUTTER, GREAT MOISTURISER WITH WOUND HEALING PROPERTIES.
'TAHLI'- UNREFINED SHEA BUTTER, SOOTHES & SOFTENS, RICH IN VIT A,E & F

name: SENSITIVE SKIN RANGE 100G MIN
description:
SOAPS FOR THOSE WITH SKIN COMPLAINTS, NON-SCENTED AND MILD ON THE SKIN, CAN BE USED FOR FACE/BODY AND HAIR- 
'BELLA' IS THE BASE OF EVERY BAR WE HAND-MAKE ON-FARM, CONTAINING QUALITY VICTORIAN OLIVE OIL AND ANGLO-NUBIAN GOAT MILK.
'SAHARA' IS SUITABLE FOR USE AS A SHAVING BAR, IT HAS CASTOR OIL ADDED FOR LATHER
'ABBEY' HAS THE ADDITION OF SEET ALMOND OIL
'TAHLI' CONTAINS UNREFINED ORGANIC SHEA BUTTER
'AMY'- APRICOT KERNAL OIL, RICH IN PROTEINS, SCENT FREE GREAT SCALP CONDITIONER, EASILY ABSORBED INTO THE SKIN.
'MIA'-JOJOBA OIL, ADDED BENEFIT OF COLLAGEN, GREAT SKIN/HAIR CONDITIONER

options.name: 'BELLA BATH' FLAKES OF SENSITIVE SKIN BARS, FOR THOSE WHO PREFER A BATH & BABIES
